column7: Instruction in trombone at the undergraduate level. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 16 hours. Prerequisite: Passing of a performance audition is required prior to the initial registration in any applied music course.
column9: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 16 hours. Prerequisite: Passing of a performance audition is required prior to the initial registration in any applied music course.
column11: Open only to students who have passed a qualifying audition. Non-music majors will be assessed a fee.
